mapper.insert: insert into role (id, role_name, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into role
id,
role_name,
status,
create_time,
update_time,
